name: THE ENROLLMENT COALITION
description: Coalition of consumer/patient advocates, plans, providers focused on federal advocacy.
sampleDescriptions: Federal polices related to Medicaid, CHIP, and health insurance that federal policymakers can adopt to improve enrollment data, systems, and processes to foster the enrollment of uninsured Americans u
